title: Bomberman
description:
Bomberman (also known as Dynablaster or Dyna Blaster in Europe) is a strategic, maze-based video game franchise originally developed by Hudson Soft. The original game was published in 1983 and new games have been published at irregular intervals ever since. Several titles in the 2000s were published by fellow Japanese game company Konami, who gained full control of the franchise when they purchased and absorbed Hudson in 2012. Today, the commercially successful Bomberman has featured in over 70 different games, as well as several anime and manga.

Bomberman:
Genre: Action
Developer: Hudson Soft
Publisher: Hudson Soft/Konami
Release Date: 1983
